name: Drytac
qualification_rationale: Strong industry alignment (Architectural Graphics). Ideal company size ($100M - $500M, ~3546 employees). Uses relevant technologies/approaches (high-performance materials, protective films, long-lasting signage). Attends key events (ISA Sign Expo, FESPA Global Print Expo) and Sponsors ISA Sign Expo and Member of Specialty Graphic Imaging Association (SGIA).

stakeholders.name: Betty Martinez
stakeholders.title: Technical Director
stakeholders.outreach_message:
Hi Betty Martinez,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Sarah from DuPont Tedlar, and I'm reaching out because we've developed protective film solutions that have been helping companies like Drytac improve durability and weather resistance in their Architectural Graphics applications.

I noticed that Drytac will be at ISA Sign Expo this year. I see we're both members of Specialty Graphic Imaging Association (SGIA). Your focus on material consistency and long-term partnerships aligns with our mission. Our Tedlar® protective films offer superior UV protection and weather resistance that can extend the life of your graphics products by up to 7 years compared to unprotected materials.

Would you be available for a 15-minute call next week to discuss how our solutions might benefit your specific applications? I'm happy to share some case studies from companies with similar requirements.

Best regards,
Sarah Miller
Senior Account Manager
DuPont Tedlar
sarah.miller@dupont.com
(302) 555-1234
stakeholders.subject_line: Protective film technology for Drytac | DuPont Tedlar

stakeholders.outreach_message:
Hello William Anderson,

I'm Michael from DuPont Tedlar's Graphics & Signage team. I've been following 3M Commercial Graphics's innovative work in the Signage and Graphics space and wanted to connect.

I noticed that 3M Commercial Graphics will be at ISA Sign Expo this year. I see we're both members of Specialty Graphic Imaging Association (SGIA). Given your role as Director of Procurement, I thought you might be interested in our latest Tedlar® protective film technology that has been helping industry leaders achieve 5x longer outdoor durability with enhanced color stability.

Our team has recently completed testing showing significant performance improvements over traditional laminates in harsh weather conditions. I'd be happy to share these results and discuss how they might apply to your specific products.

Do you have 15 minutes for a quick call next Tuesday or Wednesday?

Regards,
Michael Johnson
Technical Solutions Manager
DuPont Tedlar
